author: scheu
msg: Wrote a test to isolate a problem with the marshaller embedding a BOM within a message.
Provided a fix to the marshaling code to detect this situation and skip the BOM.

author: eric
msg: Remove core-function project and its only remaining unused class MailStoreSpoolRepository. we spool via queue interface, and core could be limited to api and library btw (IMAP-1048)
